sentences: Ei tämä nyt kyllä ihan hyvin mennyt.
Tee nyt se ensin, niin katsotaan sitten.
context: The Finnish word 'nyt' is an adverb that means 'now'. It can also be used to emphasize a point, express impatience, or belittle something. The wiktionary definition provides several examples of its usage in colloquial speech.
